TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是向用户显示一条短信建造模式对话框。A message box is a prefabricated modal dialog box that displays a text message to a user. 通过调用静态显示一个消息框方法的类。You show a message box by calling the static method of the class. 显示的文本消息是字符串参数传递给。The text message that is displayed is the string argument that you pass to . 几个重载方法还使您可以提供标题栏标题。Several overloads of the method also enables you to provide a title bar caption. 若要使用户能够关闭消息框中，显示了一个消息框**确定**按钮和一个**关闭**标题栏中的按钮。To enable a user to close a message box, displays a message box that has an **OK** button and a **Close** button in the title bar. 此外可以使用一个消息框，提出问题的用户。You can also use a message box to ask a user a question. 通过单击其中一个指定要通过使用显示的多个按钮的用户回答枚举。The user answers by clicking one of several buttons that you specify to display by using the enumeration. 可以将此枚举传递到的几个重载方法。You can pass this enumeration to several overloads of the method. 默认值枚举是。The default value of the enumeration is . 您可以确定用户的按钮单击通过检查值的返回。You can determine which button a user clicks by examining the value that returns. 返回值是值为枚举，其中每个值相当于可以显示一个消息框按钮之一。The return value is a value of the enumeration, where each value equates to one of the buttons that a message box can display. 消息框的默认值是因为**确定**是默认消息框按钮。The default value for message box is because **OK** is the default message box button. 但是，某些重载方法，可以提供不同默认值。However, some overloads of the method enable you to provide a different default value. 消息框可以进行通信的信息，并可以请求具有不同程度的重要性的问题。Message boxes can communicate information and can ask questions that have varying degrees of importance. 消息框使用图标来指示重要性。Message boxes use icons to indicate importance. 例如，图标可以指示消息是信息性，是一条警告，还是非常重要。For example, icons can indicate whether the message is informational, is a warning, or is important. 枚举封装的一组可能的消息框图标。The enumeration encapsulates the set of possible message box icons. 默认情况下，一个消息框不显示一个图标。By default, a message box does not display an icon. 但是，可以传递值为多个方法重载来指定消息框包含一个图标。However, you can pass a value to one of several method overloads in order to specify that the message box includes an icon. 消息框有时提供特殊功能，例如从右到左读取。Message boxes sometimes provide special functionality, such as right-to-left reading. 你可以使用一个或多个自定义消息框的行为枚举值的某些重载接受方法。You can customize the behavior of a message box by using one or more enumeration values that are accepted by some overloads of the method. 消息框始终具有一个所有者窗口。Message boxes always have an owner window. 默认情况下，消息框的所有者是在一个消息框打开的时间内的应用程序中当前处于活动状态的窗口。By default, the owner of a message box is the window that is currently active in an application at the time that a message box is opened. 但是，可以指定另一个所有者通过使用某个重载。However, you can specify another owner for the by using one of several overloads. 有关所有者窗口的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about owner windows, see . 有关详细信息，请参阅[MessageBox 示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023)。For more information, see [MessageBox Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023).

summary.span: 显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的重载方法，使您能够指定所有者窗口。Use an overload of the method, which enables you to specify an owner window. 否则，消息框属于当前处于活动状态的窗口。Otherwise, the message box is owned by the window that is currently active.

span.span: A that specifies the text to display.

summary.span: 显示一个消息框，该消息框包含消息并返回结果。

span.span: Displays a message box that has a message and that returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 值，用于指定用户单击了哪个消息框按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

param.span: 一个 ，表示消息框的所有者窗口。

span.span: A that represents the owner window of the message box.

param.name: messageBoxText
param.span: 一个 ，用于指定要显示的文本。

span.span: A that specifies the text to display.

param.name: caption
param.span: 一个 ，用于指定要显示的标题栏标题。

span.span: A that specifies the title bar caption to display.

param.name: button
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定要显示哪个按钮或哪些按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which button or buttons to display.

param.name: icon
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定要显示的图标。

span.span: A value that specifies the icon to display.

param.name: defaultResult
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定消息框的默认结果。

span.span: A value that specifies the default result of the message box.

summary.span: 在指定窗口的前面显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.

summary.span: 该消息框显示消息、标题栏标题、按钮和图标，并接受默认消息框结果和返回结果。

span.span: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and accepts a default message box result and returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 值，用于指定用户单击了哪个消息框按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，消息框显示在前面的窗口中当前处于活动状态。By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.

summary.span: 在指定窗口的前面显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.
